DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess diagnostic performance urinary marker detrusor overactivity ( Nerve Growth Factor ( NGF ) , Brain-Derived Neurotrophic Factor ( BDNF ) , adenosine triphosphate ( ATP ) , Prostaglandine E2 ) detect high pressure bladder un spina bifida patient .
DOC.brief_title: Urinary Markers Detrusor Overactivity Spina Bifida Patients
DOC.criteria: Study arm : Spina bifida patient Seen consecutively outpatient clinic Age > 18 yearsold Control arm : Patients multiple sclerosis spinal cord injury overactive bladder Seen consecutively urodynamics low urinary tract symptom Age > 18 yearsold Positive urine culture History urologic neoplasms History interstitial cystitis
